trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"></xref> event and the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"></xref>事件和<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.AppDomain>关闭实例或将其卸载，<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown>事件或<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded>引发事件时，分别。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs 对象存储关闭的原因或卸载和作为其参数之一传递给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"></xref> class.

This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>与<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A>属性设置为`reason`。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 托管的应用程序域关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: 获取托管应用程序域已关闭的原因。

trans-unit.source: The Reason property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: 原因属性存储<xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>对象作为其值，该值描述原因<xref:System.AppDomain>实例已关闭。</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>
